lyrics.stanza: God fell in love with man; For only God's love can Make man just the same as He In life and in nature. We are His expression, His bride, His enlargement; Forever, together, As living, insep'rable as one couple Eternally.
Though born as a sinner, His blood has redeemed me. He suffered on Calv'ry, Then raised up in glory, To regenerate me. Now joined in one spirit I love to enjoy Him, For I've been forgiven!
His love is so tender, To Him I'll surrender; His name is so precious, I gladly call, "Jesus!" His Person's so charming, My heart ever winning; I'll hold back no longer, I'll love Him forever.
